article_title: Banks Should Not Be Forced to Buy 'Stock' in the Federal Reserve
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: The Fed can literally create any amount of money it needs to pay its liabilities, so it can never be insolvent in the same manner as a private business.
